p: In Figure 3, we report the effects of compounds 5,6-dichloro-2-phenyl-2H-benzo[d][1,2,3]triazoles (2n, 2l, 2j, 2f, 2k) on the replication of HTNV in comparison to RBV, a known broad-spectrum antiviral agent. Series 1, 3, and 4 derivatives turned out as completely inactive and are not reported here (see Table S1).
